title: Earth's Remnant
description: Haylee was more confident designing starships than raising an autistic child. Now she just wants a relaxing holiday with her family. But when Earth falls to an alien armada, she knows life will never be the same again.Les was just a cruise ship captain. Now, he must rise up and become something greater, if he is to keep his crew and passengers alive.Braxton never wanted to leave the space navy, but now, taking a cruise is the only way to feel the stars around him. This crisis may be his ticket to regaining the life he thought was gone forever.Can they overcome their differences and save everyone on the ship?If they reach unexplored space, they might yet survive, but an unstoppable enemy stands in their wayâ€¦
author: Adam David Collings
